name: Kitty (Kitomolous)
description: Fate’s beloved emotional support cat. Small, calm, and unbothered by the strange energies of the world.
background: Appears in dreams, laps, beds, and occasionally lecture halls without explanation.

bell.description: A tiny brass bell on a faded purple collar. Barely makes a sound.

Fate.description: Kitty is Fate’s heart in feline form.
